name: maintainer-dashboard
description: A comprehensive maintainer dashboard for GitHub repository management

scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 npm run preview
